A

AbstractEncryptionCodec - Class in com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.impl
Abstract base class that contains everything an EncryptionCodec needs to do apart from the actual encrypt and decrypt routines, which are cipher specific.
AbstractEncryptionCodec() - Constructor for class com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.impl.AbstractEncryptionCodec
 
AbstractStAXProcessor<T> - Class in com.autonomy.aci.client.services.impl
Abstract Processor that should be used by all processors wanting to process the ACI response via the JSR173 StAX API.
AbstractStAXProcessor() - Constructor for class com.autonomy.aci.client.services.impl.AbstractStAXProcessor
This constructor gets a new XMLInputFactory instance that is reused every time AbstractStAXProcessor.process(com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.AciResponseInputStream) is called, this should be faster than creating a new instance every time this method is called.
